description:
This bright and sunny artist's apartment has a private entrance. It in the heart of a vibrant latin neighborhood (and a few avenues away from Brooklyn Chinatown).  It's close Tacos Matamoros , La Gran Via Bakery, Sunset Park, and Bush Terminal Park. It's closet to the R train 53rd street stop with a short walk to the 59th street  express N train stop. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the comfy bed, and the light. My place is good for couples and families (with kids).

Our spacious, newly refurbished apartment is situated on a quiet neighborhood block in the heart of Sunset Park.  It has lots of windows, comfortable furniture, brand new appliances, and original artwork created by one of the hosts.

Guests will have access to the entire apartment: bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, living space, and an extra room that can be used as a living space or bedroom.

We will be accessible, but will not be on the premise.

We are located in a friendly, quiet neighborhood.  There are lots of green spaces and many great places to get a good taco.

53rd street R train, 59th street N train, B37, B63.

We know you will enjoy our warm and diverse neighborhood.  Please be aware that our space is not currently wheelchair accessible.
name: Sunny Sunset Park Apt
review:
Very clean, comfortable place to live and feels like home, Jessica was kind enough to share her kitchen stuff with us, also she let us play her acoustic guitar, it was great to play guitar again after a long time.
If I come again to NYC I will definitely try to stay at their lovely apartment :)
